level_3: Search helps you compare roles at big vs small companies.
You find real job descriptions and skill lists.
People share stories about switching roles.
Career maps show senior/junior levels and promotions.
Guides show how to prepare for target roles.
level_4: Advanced searches find niche roles like DevOps or Data Engineer.
You find mentoring resources to guide your roadmap.
Experts share frameworks for 3-5 year career plans.
Search connects you to communities like Reddit or Discord.
You learn how to update your roadmap as you grow.
